Within the past few weeks of me just staring at my screen, dead by daylight is the thing that is open the most. Dead by daylight might seem like a simple game on the surface, and it is NOT for everyone, but for me it is a spectacular game with so many in depth micro mechanics. I enjoy this game every time I start it up and as of writing this review have gained almost 100 hours in the past two weeks. Even though it only has 1 game mode I really think that this is one of the best games on the steam marketplace as of now. P.S don't buy blood garden, it isn't the same.

I have been on the fence about getting this game for a while now and I'm happy I finally jumped in. 
It can feel a bit overwhelmingly stressful at first, but just keep getting into matches and once you get in the groove you'll realize you're hooked. Playing as both sides is what I would recommend, they both offer intense but different ways to experience the game. Survivor can be frustrating if you get bad teams because you really need to work together to get out, but getting into the next survivor game is quick enough that I don't really mind having to deal with some bad teams. Killer is pretty stressful when you're not quite sure how to apply pressure on the maps, but after a few games you'll start figuring things out and be on your way to getting those sacrifices.

So get your mom's credit card and purchase this today!
